title: spec: clarify that iteration variables are "evaluated" in each iteration in for-range loops
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/CqCtJDGoB2

Both gc and gccgo invoke f() in each iteration; that is the "iteration variable" is evaluated each time. This can be concluded from the spec since values are assigned to iteration variables like in an assignment, but perhaps it should be mentioned explicitly or have an example.
